wines.description: A distinguished Red Blend showcasing exceptional quality. This wine offers complexity and character with the 2023 vintage demonstrating balance and finesse.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose reveals enticing aromas of mixed berries and dark fruit, complemented by notes of spice, oak. As the wine opens, additional layers of complexity emerge with hints of dark fruit. The aromatic profile is both inviting and sophisticated, showcasing the wine's quality and terroir expression.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, this wine is balanced and medium to full-bodied, delivering flavors of layered flavors, integrated tannins. The mid-palate shows excellent concentration with a harmonious balance of fruit and structure. Well-integrated oak and refined tannins provide framework without overwhelming the pure fruit expression. The overall impression is one of elegance and precision.
tastingNotes.finish: The finish is harmonious and satisfying, with complex flavors that invite another sip. This wine demonstrates excellent craftsmanship and attention to detail throughout.

servingInfo.decanting: Decant for 45-60 minutes to integrate flavors

wineDetails.ageability: Ready to enjoy now. Drinking window of 3-5 years from vintage.

wineDetails.ageability: Ready to enjoy now. Drinking window of 3-5 years from vintage.

wines.description: A distinguished Riesling showcasing exceptional quality. This wine offers complexity and character with the 2023 vintage demonstrating balance and finesse.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose reveals enticing aromas of peach and apricot, complemented by notes of honey, petrol, lime. As the wine opens, additional layers of complexity emerge with hints of petrol. The aromatic profile is both inviting and sophisticated, showcasing the wine's quality and terroir expression.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, this wine is off-dry to sweet and medium-bodied, delivering flavors of stone fruit, bright acidity, minerality. The mid-palate shows excellent concentration with a harmonious balance of fruit and structure. Well-integrated oak and refined tannins provide framework without overwhelming the pure fruit expression. The overall impression is one of elegance and precision.
tastingNotes.finish: The finish is crisp and lingering, with refreshing flavors that invite another sip. This wine demonstrates excellent craftsmanship and attention to detail throughout.

servingInfo.glassware: Riesling glass or standard white wine glass

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2026. Best enjoyed fresh and vibrant.

wines.productName: Knuttel Family Russian River Valley Chardonnay, Kate's Pas de Deux 2021
wines.description: A distinguished Chardonnay showcasing Russian River Valley terroir. This wine offers complexity and character with the 2021 vintage demonstrating balance and finesse.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose reveals enticing aromas of green apple and pear, complemented by notes of citrus, butter. As the wine opens, additional layers of complexity emerge with hints of vanilla. The aromatic profile is both inviting and sophisticated, showcasing the wine's quality and terroir expression.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, this wine is creamy and medium to full-bodied, delivering flavors of lemon zest, toast, minerality. The mid-palate shows excellent concentration with a harmonious balance of fruit and structure. Well-integrated oak and refined tannins provide framework without overwhelming the pure fruit expression. The overall impression is one of elegance and precision.
tastingNotes.finish: The finish is clean and crisp, with lingering flavors that invite another sip. This wine demonstrates excellent craftsmanship and attention to detail throughout.

servingInfo.glassware: Burgundy or large white wine glass

wineDetails.ageability: Best enjoyed now through 2026. Peak drinking window of 5-8 years.

wines.description: A distinguished Merlot showcasing exceptional quality. This wine offers complexity and character with the 2018 vintage demonstrating balance and finesse.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose reveals enticing aromas of plum and black cherry, complemented by notes of chocolate, herbs. As the wine opens, additional layers of complexity emerge with hints of herbs. The aromatic profile is both inviting and sophisticated, showcasing the wine's quality and terroir expression.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, this wine is smooth and medium to full-bodied, delivering flavors of velvety, soft tannins, ripe fruit. The mid-palate shows excellent concentration with a harmonious balance of fruit and structure. Well-integrated oak and refined tannins provide framework without overwhelming the pure fruit expression. The overall impression is one of elegance and precision.
tastingNotes.finish: The finish is round and approachable, with balanced flavors that invite another sip. This wine demonstrates excellent craftsmanship and attention to detail throughout.

servingInfo.decanting: Decant for 30-45 minutes for optimal expression
